Title: Made to Suffer
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Robert Kirkman
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden, Norman Reedus
Plot: Rick, Daryl, Michonne and Oscar enter Woodbury in search of Glenn and Maggie. Meanwhile, a new group of survivors encounter the prison.
